name: MEC Trax Nordic Soft Shell Jacket - Women's
description:
Break a sweat, and new tracks, in cold conditions. Waterproof and windproof panels let you tackle harsh conditions head-on, while the highly breathable upper back panel prevents you from overheating when you increase intensity.Wind- and waterproof main fabric is 3-layer polyester soft shell with a polyurethane laminate and DWR finish.Fabric has 4-way stretch for full mobility.Brushed Miti Lombardia nylon and spandex thermal upper back and underarm panels are breathable and weather-resistant.2-way zipper provides venting options.Over-hang cuff offers extra coverage without getting in the way poles.Elastic drawcord hem seals out gusts.Zippered front pockets and rear pocket.Reflective details keep you visible.

Slim fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
